title: Welcome
sitename: Dr. Tara Ritter, DC, FIAMA and Dr. Giana Anselmo, DC
cleaned_text: Welcome Chiropractor and Acupuncturist in Downtown Denver, CO - 80202 At Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture, we believe that the chiropractor and patient become a team for treating an individual's chiropractic problems. Dr. Tara Ritter and Dr. Giana Anselmo spend most of their time listening so that they can understand your concerns and then responding with the best treatment options for you. With the help of our professional [staff](/staff/), we also follow up to make sure that problems are resolved and your health improves. We want our patients to be informed about muscle, bone, joint and connective tissue concerns and treatments, because informed patients make better decisions about their health and well being. That is why we've included a section on this website covering common topics associated with [chiropractic care](/patient-education/). We encourage you to look through these pages whenever you have an interest or concern related to chiropractic health. We also know that convenience is important to your selection of a chiropractor. In these web pages you'll find information about Motion Chiropractic and Acupuncture's office, including our [location](/office/), [maps](/new-patients/#directions), [directions](/new-patients/#directions), [hours](/office/), insurance policies and appointment scheduling. Please feel free to contact us with any questions you have or to [request an appointment](/appointment-request/). We hope you'll find our practice offers the accessibility and personal commitment you look for from a chiropractor. Thank you for taking the time to visit our website. In practice as well as online, we strive for excellence through superior patient treatment, education, and satisfaction. Within this site you will find all types of health-related information. Information about our office and services, chiropractic, acupuncture, diet and nutrition, back and neck dysfunction, headaches, worker's compensation and automobile (MVA) injuries, a monthly health newsletter and much, much more. We hope you enjoy the information and share it with others. We are grateful to be able to serve downtown Denver with chiropractic and acupuncture treatment. Again, thank you for visiting and remember to contact us with any questions. Health as a Lifestyle, Dr. Tara Ritter, DC, FIAMA Dr. Giana Anselmo, DC
